#summary Introduction to tools for STM8S development

= Required Development Tools / Hardware =

  * [http://www.st.com/internet/com/SOFTWARE_RESOURCES/TOOL/TOOLSET/sttoolset.zip ST Visual Develop] Current version 4.3.0 and STVP 3.2.4
  * [http://www.st.com/internet/com/SOFTWARE_RESOURCES/SW_COMPONENT/FIRMWARE/stm8_stdperiph_lib.zip STM8S/A Standard Peripherals Library]
  * [http://www.cosmicsoftware.com/download_stm8_32k.php Cosmic Software STM8/32K free compiler version]
  * [http://www.st.com/internet/evalboard/product/247087.jsp STM8S-DISCOVERY]

== Reference manuals ==

  * [http://www.st.com/internet/com/TECHNICAL_RESOURCES/TECHNICAL_LITERATURE/DATASHEET/CD00200092.pdf STM8S10x Family Datasheet] - This covers pinouts, memory map, package info, etc.
  * [http://www.st.com/internet/com/TECHNICAL_RESOURCES/TECHNICAL_LITERATURE/REFERENCE_MANUAL/CD00190271.pdf STM8S10x Family Reference Manual] - This covers each peripheral in detail.
  * [http://www.st.com/internet/com/TECHNICAL_RESOURCES/TECHNICAL_LITERATURE/APPLICATION_NOTE/CD00194637.pdf STM8S Hardware connections checklist] - This covers Power/Clocking/etc.

= Install =

  # Install cosmic compiler and request license (takes 1 business day).
  # Install STVD.
  # Install STM8 StdPeriphLib.
  # Order STM8S-DISCOVERY for $9 from DigiKey or local reseller.
  # Receive STM8-DISCOVERY.
  # To debug external targets, remove solder jumpers SB1/SB2 from STM8-DISCOVERY.
  # Debug.
